name: Vera Swings
description: Vera has always dreamed of going to the moon. Now her dreams can finally take her there.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 or better Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: A controller is recommended but not required. Laptops with quality touchpads are supported.
